message: Let's start with a fair split, I'll take the majority, but you get a decent chunk too!
I'll take a larger share this time, but I'll be generous
That's a bit too generous for you, isn't it?
Meet me in the middle, and we can end this
You said meet in the middle, so I'm meeting you there!
That's not what I meant by'meet in the middle'!
I'll give you a slightly smaller share, but I'm not going to give up
You're not giving up, neither am I. I'll try to squeeze out a bit more
You're really pushing it now, Bob!
I'll give you a smaller share, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of
I'm not getting taken advantage of either, let's meet in the middle again
I don't think that's meeting in the middle, Bob!
I'm not budging, it's time to make a serious offer
I'm not budging either, I'll take a slightly larger share this time
That's it, Bob, I'm not going to accept such a low offer!
I'm not going to give up, I'm making a final stand
Fine, I'll meet you at the final stand, 50/50 it is
